# Festival Technology Adoption Timeline

Horizontal timeline showing technology adoption from 2015 to 2030 across multiple festival systems.

## Data Points (Year by Year)

**2015:**
- RFID wristbands: 15% adoption
- Mobile ticketing: 8% adoption
- Cashless payments: 5% adoption

**2018:**
- RFID wristbands: 45% adoption
- Mobile ticketing: 38% adoption
- Cashless payments: 22% adoption
- Facial recognition: 2% adoption (early trials)

**2021:**
- RFID wristbands: 78% adoption
- Mobile ticketing: 81% adoption
- Cashless payments: 67% adoption
- Facial recognition: 15% adoption
- AI crowd monitoring: 8% adoption

**2024:**
- RFID wristbands: 92% adoption
- Mobile ticketing: 95% adoption
- Cashless payments: 89% adoption
- Facial recognition: 42% adoption
- AI crowd monitoring: 35% adoption
- Dynamic pricing: 28% adoption

**2027 (Projected):**
- RFID wristbands: 98% adoption
- Mobile ticketing: 99% adoption
- Cashless payments: 97% adoption
- Facial recognition: 71% adoption
- AI crowd monitoring: 68% adoption
- Dynamic pricing: 62% adoption

**2030 (Projected):**
- RFID wristbands: 99% adoption
- Mobile ticketing: 100% adoption
- Cashless payments: 99% adoption
- Facial recognition: 88% adoption
- AI crowd monitoring: 85% adoption
- Dynamic pricing: 82% adoption

## Style

- Colors: Deep purple (#6B46C1), electric coral (#FF6B6B), sky blue (#4299E1), white (#FFFFFF)
- White space: 30%+ composition
- Typography: 16pt body text, 24pt year labels, clean sans-serif
- Context: Festival technology, RFID wristbands, mobile devices

## Structure

Horizontal timeline with 6 time points (2015, 2018, 2021, 2024, 2027, 2030). Each time point shows multiple technology adoption percentages. Color-coded lines connect same technology across years.
